Self.Wiki: Determines the configuration for mini-areas. Never used.

areaName.Wiki: Text ID of the name assigned to this mini-area.

openEventFlag.Wiki: The event flag ID associated with the availability status of this mini-area.

warningLineStartDisplayDistance.Wiki: The distance from the area boundary to start displaying the area boundary warning line. (-1 means no warning line is displayed). In metres.

warningLineDisplayDistance.Wiki: The distance from the area boundary to display the area boundary warning line at. (-1 means no warning line is displayed). In metres.
